snippet.title: (VR) Eye in the Sky - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Eye in the Sky (early access) available 28th of April! 

http://store.steampowered.com/app/566700

Get ready to partner up with a friend and work your way through a series of escape rooms in Eye in the Sky!

Eye in the Sky is made up of a series of asymmetrical local co-operative escape rooms made for SteamVR. One player will use the HTC Vive while the other can use keyboard and mouse to solve puzzles together.

Currently in the game:

9 escape rooms spanned across 2 chapters
3 experimental single player levels

Yet to come:

2 more chapters with more custom co-op levels

A dozen more single player puzzles to address the fact that we found it hard to add an extra human to the overal package and keep the price low.


For more info visit www.vinliagames.com 
Follow us:
www.twitter.com/vinliagames
www.facebook.com/vinliagames
